when.test: limit != null and offset !=null and page!=null

choose.when:
select * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (select * from PART_LAKE
AND (SELECT wm_concat(b.partlakeids) FROM sys_role_resource b WHERE b.roleid IN (${roleId})) LIKE '%'||PART_LAKE.ID||'%'
AND ID like '%'||to_char(#{id})||'%'
AND LAKEID = #{lakeId}
AND NAME like '%'||to_char(#{name})||'%'
AND AREA_ID in (select area_id FROM sys_area START WITH area_id=#{areaId} CONNECT BY prior area_id = parent_id)
AND CODE like '%'||to_char(#{code})||'%'
AND ALIAS like '%'||to_char(#{alias})||'%'
AND RIVERSTART like '%'||to_char(#{riverStart})||'%'
AND RIVEREND like '%'||to_char(#{riverEnd})||'%'
AND STARTX like '%'||to_char(#{startX})||'%'
AND STARTY like '%'||to_char(#{startY})||'%'
AND ENDX like '%'||to_char(#{endX})||'%'
AND ENDY like '%'||to_char(#{endY})||'%'
AND LENGTH like '%'||to_char(#{length})||'%'
AND REMARK like '%'||to_char(#{remark})||'%'
AND FEATUREID like '%'||to_char(#{featureId})||'%'
order by ${sidx} ${order}
order by createtime desc
) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit} * #{page} ) WHERE RN > #{offset} )
choose.otherwise:
select * from PART_LAKE
AND (SELECT wm_concat(b.partlakeids) FROM sys_role_resource b WHERE b.roleid IN (${roleId})) LIKE '%'||PART_LAKE.ID||'%'
AND ID like '%'||to_char(#{id})||'%'
AND LAKEID = #{lakeId}
AND NAME like '%'||to_char(#{name})||'%'
AND AREA_ID in (select area_id FROM sys_area START WITH area_id=#{areaId} CONNECT BY prior area_id = parent_id)
AND CODE like '%'||to_char(#{code})||'%'
AND ALIAS like '%'||to_char(#{alias})||'%'
AND RIVERSTART like '%'||to_char(#{riverStart})||'%'
AND RIVEREND like '%'||to_char(#{riverEnd})||'%'
AND STARTX like '%'||to_char(#{startX})||'%'
AND STARTY like '%'||to_char(#{startY})||'%'
AND ENDX like '%'||to_char(#{endX})||'%'
AND ENDY like '%'||to_char(#{endY})||'%'
AND LENGTH like '%'||to_char(#{length})||'%'
AND REMARK like '%'||to_char(#{remark})||'%'
AND FEATUREID like '%'||to_char(#{featureId})||'%'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from PART_LAKE
AND (SELECT wm_concat(b.partlakeids) FROM sys_role_resource b WHERE b.roleid IN (${roleId})) LIKE '%'||PART_LAKE.ID||'%'
AND ID like '%'||to_char(#{id})||'%'
AND LAKEID = #{lakeId}
AND NAME like '%'||to_char(#{name})||'%'
AND AREA_ID in (select area_id FROM sys_area START WITH area_id=#{areaId} CONNECT BY prior area_id = parent_id)
AND CODE like '%'||to_char(#{code})||'%'
AND ALIAS like '%'||to_char(#{alias})||'%'
AND RIVERSTART like '%'||to_char(#{riverStart})||'%'
AND RIVEREND like '%'||to_char(#{riverEnd})||'%'
AND STARTX like '%'||to_char(#{startX})||'%'
AND STARTY like '%'||to_char(#{startY})||'%'
AND ENDX like '%'||to_char(#{endX})||'%'
AND ENDY like '%'||to_char(#{endY})||'%'
AND LENGTH like '%'||to_char(#{length})||'%'
AND REMARK like '%'||to_char(#{remark})||'%'
AND FEATUREID like '%'||to_char(#{featureId})||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into PART_LAKE ( HEADER , COORDINATER , POLICEMAN , CHECKER , SUPERVISER , DUTY , AIM , HEADERREMARK , HEADERPOST , COORDINATERPOST , CHECKERPOST , SUPERVISERPOST , ID , LAKEID , NAME , AREA_ID , CODE , ALIAS , RIVERSTART , RIVEREND , STARTX , STARTY , ENDX , ENDY , LENGTH , REMARK, FEATUREID ) values ( #{header,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coordinater,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{policeman,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{checker,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{superviser,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{duty,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{aim,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{headerremark,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{headerpost,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{coordinaterpost,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{checkerpost,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{superviserpost,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{lakeId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{areaId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{riverStart,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{riverEnd,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{startX,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{startY,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{endX,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{endY,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{featureId,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update PART_LAKE
HEADER = #{header} ,
COORDINATER = #{coordinater} ,
POLICEMAN = #{policeman} ,
CHECKER = #{checker} ,
SUPERVISER = #{superviser} ,
DUTY = #{duty} ,
AIM = #{aim} ,
HEADERREMARK = #{headerremark} ,
HEADERPOST = #{headerpost} ,
COORDINATERPOST = #{coordinaterpost} ,
CHECKERPOST = #{checkerpost} ,
SUPERVISERPOST = #{superviserpost} ,
LAKEID = #{lakeId} ,
NAME = #{name} ,
AREA_ID = #{areaId} ,
CODE = #{code} ,
ALIAS = #{alias} ,
RIVERSTART = #{riverStart} ,
RIVEREND = #{riverEnd} ,
STARTX = #{startX} ,
STARTY = #{startY} ,
ENDX = #{endX} ,
ENDY = #{endY} ,
LENGTH = #{length} ,
REMARK = #{remark},
FEATUREID = #{featureId},
where ID = #{id}
